pr_title: NXP-29712: Fix CLID usage when installing a package in the Docker image

timeline.message:
NXP-29712: Fix CLID usage when installing a package in the Docker image

We need to replace all occurrences of -- by \n, not only the first one.

timeline.bodyText: What is this supposed to do? This syntax with // is not documented
timeline.author: efge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -57,7 +57,7 @@ fi
 if [ -n "$NUXEO_CLID" ]; then
   echo "ENTRYPOINT: Write NUXEO_CLID environment variable to /var/lib/nuxeo/instance.clid"
   # Replace -- by a carriage return
-  NUXEO_CLID="${NUXEO_CLID/--/\\n}"
+  NUXEO_CLID="${NUXEO_CLID//--/\\n}"

replies.bodyText: Ok sorry it is documented, I didn't read the bash doc carefully enough.
replies.author: efge

replies.bodyText: Hm you mean the extended description hidden behind "..." in the PR pages...
replies.author: efge
